source.ce760406:
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
imp_cat = SimpleImputer(missing_values=np.nan, strategy='most_frequent') 
imp_num = SimpleImputer(missing_values=np.nan, strategy='mean')

#Tipe Kendaraan
df_train['Tipe_Kendaraan'] = imp_cat.fit_transform(np.array(df_train['Tipe_Kendaraan']).reshape(-1, 1))
df_test['Tipe_Kendaraan'] = imp_cat.fit_transform(np.array(df_test['Tipe_Kendaraan']).reshape(-1, 1))

#Tipe Tujuan
df_train['Tipe_Tujuan'] = imp_cat.fit_transform(np.array(df_train['Tipe_Tujuan']).reshape(-1, 1))
df_test['Tipe_Tujuan'] = imp_cat.fit_transform(np.array(df_test['Tipe_Tujuan']).reshape(-1, 1))

#Indeks_Gaya_Hidup
df_train['Indeks_Gaya_Hidup'].fillna(df_train['Indeks_Gaya_Hidup'].mean(), inplace = True)
df_test['Indeks_Gaya_Hidup'].fillna(df_test['Indeks_Gaya_Hidup'].mean(), inplace = True)

#Jarak_Perjalanan
df_train['Jarak_Perjalanan'].fillna(df_train['Jarak_Perjalanan'].mean(), inplace = True)
df_test['Jarak_Perjalanan'].fillna(df_test['Jarak_Perjalanan'].mean(), inplace = True)
source.66ac3ec9:
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder
enc = OneHotEncoder(handle_unknown='ignore')

enc_df_train = pd.DataFrame(enc.fit_transform(df_train[['Tipe_Kendaraan', 'Tipe_Tujuan']]).toarray())
enc_df_test = pd.DataFrame(enc.transform(df_test[['Tipe_Kendaraan', 'Tipe_Tujuan']]).toarray())
source.c3505ee8:

y = df_train['Target']

source.5c9ffe60:
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split

X_train, X_val, y_train, y_val = train_test_split(X, y, test_size=0.3, random_state=42, stratify=y)
source.c437eb89:
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score, classification_report
from sklearn.tree import DecisionTreeClassifier

model = DecisionTreeClassifier()
model.fit(X_train, y_train)
y_pred = model.predict(X_val)

print(classification_report(y_val, y_pred))
